title: ŠKODA India introduces the ‘Octavia Anniversary Edition’ at Rs 15.75 lakhs (ex-show
text: ŠKODA India introduces the ‘Octavia Anniversary Edition’ at Rs 15.75 lakhs (ex-show Presents revolutionary ‘SmartLink connectivity’ for the first time in the Indian market India, 14 September 2015 -- Revamps the Octavia model range with attractive new features. The ‘Octavia Anniversary Edition’ will include additional features like ‘SmartLink connectivity’, rear view camera, keyless entry and engine start stop, rear side airbags and gearshift controls on the steering wheel.Presents revolutionary ‘SmartLink connectivity’ for the first time in the Indian market• Revamps the Octavia model range with attractive new features • The ‘Octavia Anniversary Edition’ will include additional features like ‘SmartLink connectivity’, rear view camera, keyless entry and engine start stop, rear side airbags and gearshift controls on the steering wheel• 100% safety in all ŠKODA models with dual airbags standard across the entire product portfolio making it one of the safest model ranges in India • The ‘Octavia Anniversary edition’ will be available for a limited period only The SmartLink function will bridge the connectivity between the car and the mobile. This technology allows customers to use selected smartphone apps on the infotainment system screen. The Octavia will offer SmartLink with an integrated connectivity package which includes Apple CarPlay, Android Auto and MirrorLink systems. Whether you want to select and listen to music on your smartphone or receive turn-by-turn directions, all of this will be mirrored on the central display. The Octavia boasts of unrivalled space, timeless elegant design, high functionality, innovative safety & comfort systems, high fuel economy, packed with Simply Clever features and globally renowned ŠKODA’s value proposition. One unique selling point of the ŠKODA Octavia in its segment is the combination of the elegant saloon car shape with the practical advantages of a car with a large fifth door. The Octavia anniversary edition is another offering from ŠKODA India which will make the Octavia more accessible to our discerning customers. # # #
